profile:
For over 25 years The Carpet Palace has strived to provide high quality flooring and area rugs at fantastic prices. Our loyal community has allowed us to grow into the company we are today, serving a large portion of the Ontario marketplace including, but not limited to: Georgetown, Brampton, Mississauga, Milton, Acton, Oakville, Burlington and surrounding areas. 

We are pleased to announce that with our expansion, we are now able to service areas outside of the Halton/Peel region-- if you get to us, we will get to you! With the best in hardwood, laminate, carpeting, tile & stone, vinyl flooring and area rugs we can help you through all of your flooring projects.

Enjoy your worry-free shopping experience, knowing that we provide the best product and installation warranties in the business. Contact us by phone or email for answers to your questions about how we can help you!

Contact Info:
(905) 873-7955
www.CarpetPalace.ca
1carpetpalace@gmail.com
